General.Name: Leysen Jewellery Inc
General.Description: Leysen Jewellery Inc. engages in the design, development, and retail of diamond jewelry products in China. The company also engages in the brand operation management activities. The company was formerly known as Tesiro Jewelry Inc. Leysen Jewellery Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Nanjing, China.
